titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to authorize a State to include in highway construction contracts a guaranty or warranty clause for materials and workmanship.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2381)
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. Authorizes a State highway department to include a clause in a contract for the construction of a Federal-aid highway which requires the contractor to guarantee or warrant materials and workmanship. Makes such a clause applicable to a specific construction product or feature but not to routine maintenance.
